message.content:
cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.CC, cs.SD

Reasoning: 
- cs.AI is the most likely category as the paper discusses Ludii's potential to support AI research topics and competitions.
- cs.GT (Game Theory) is also likely as the paper describes Ludii's aim to model and analyze traditional strategy games.
- cs.LG (Learning) is relevant as Ludii can potentially lead to algorithm improvements and new avenues of research.
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) may be relevant as the paper discusses the strengths and weaknesses of different competition platforms.
- cs.SD (Software Engineering) may be relevant as the paper describes the development of the Ludii system.
